Appealing and well-designed, this 19-inch Lenovo ThinkVision monitor is designed for people who want to improve their computer systems. Writers and computer enthusiasts alike can take pride in the sharpness, electronics, and capabilities of this Lenovo ThinkVision monitor. Since the Lenovo L191P comes with clear advanced image technology, you can take advantage of its configurability and improved screen privacy. With its black body, this Lenovo ThinkVision monitor will be a classic upgrade for any computer. The superior mid-sized screen featured on this flat-panel LCD TFT monitor enables you to reap the benefits of greater amusement when working. Furthermore, since the Lenovo L191P has effective controls, you can quickly set the aspect ratio, color balance, and brightness just the way you like it.
